>@Compendium[sfrpg.classes.bItuvukGHbObTApr]{Mystic}

While most mystics receive powers closely aligned to their connection, a few receive glimpses of supernatural insight that allows them to access different powers. Among mystic scholars, such an insight is generally known as an epiphany. Whenever you would gain a connection power, you can choose an epiphany of equal or lower level instead. For example, when you gain your 3rd-level connection power, you can choose any 1st-level or 3rd-level epiphany instead of gaining that connection power.
If an epiphany allows a saving throw to resist its effects, the DC is equal to 10 + half your mystic level + your Wisdom modifier. If the epiphany requires an enemy to attempt a skill check, the DC is equal to 10 + 1-1/2 Ã— your mystic level + your Wisdom modifier.

1st Level

You must be at least 1st-level to choose the following epiphanies.

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.XT6q5s5eJ5Com2gJ]{Empowered Healing Touch (Su)}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.q5qcj07bCOLkI9st]{Overbearing Stare (Su)}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.CM653mGxWlUdybKM]{Wrecking Fists (Su)}
